about_the_game:
It is a turn-based strategy game similar to a board game.

The goal of the game is to capture 12 regions. For each captured region, the player gets one point. The one who reaches the goal first wins.

The game consists of turns. Each turn consists of three phases. The first phase is the orders phase. Only three orders can be given per turn. When all players press “next move”, the second phase begins. In this phase, each player takes turns executing the orders he chose in the previous phase.

Among the orders are march, defense, muster troops, hold a tournament and capture territory.

When all orders have been completed, the game enters the game world phase. A random world event card is played. Then a new round begins.

Features:

  • Give orders on your lands by thinking through your strategy and tactics

  • Manage your deck - your victory depends on the correct use of cards.

  • Lead your troops - can you reach your goal with minimal casualties?

  • Single and multiplayer games - play against artificial intelligence or friends

  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
